rules.title: Schwergepanzertes Fahrzeug (H-AV)
description: Einheiten vom Typ H-AV können zwei Schaden einstecken, bevor sie zerstört werden, und zählen als zwei Einheiten für Überzahl, Beschussmarken, Anzahl der Angriffe in einem Nahkampf, Trefferzuweisung und die maximale Anzahl von Einheiten im direkten Kontakt. H-AVs werden behandelt wie WE, wenn sie von Waffen getroffen werden, die mehrere Punkte Schaden verursachen (z. B. TK(W3)). Außerdem können H-AVs kritisch getroffen werden. Bei einem kritischen Treffer wird die Einheit ohne weitere Effekte zerstört. H-AVs können mit Punktgenauen Angriffen beschossen werden, zielen jedoch nicht auf einzelne Modelle ab. Stattdessen werden Treffer in der Formation zufällig bestimmt. In allen anderen Belangen werden H-AVs wie normale gepanzerte Fahrzeuge behandelt.

rules.title: Maschinengeist
description: Ein Verband, der ausschließlich aus Einheiten mit Maschinengeist besteht, darf nur die Aktionen Halten, Offensive, Ordnen, Dauerfeuer und Feuerbereitschaft durchführen. Darüber hinaus können solche Verbände nur umkämpfte Ziele beanspruchen und gelten immer als innerhalb von 30cm einer feindlichen Formation, wenn sie versuchen, sich zu sammeln.

rules.title: Deflektorschilde
description: Jedes Deflektorschild stoppt automatisch einen Schadenspunkt und wird dann heruntergefahren. Führt keine Rettungswürfe für Treffer die durch Deflektorschilde gestoppt wurden durch. Von einem Deflektorschild abgefangene Treffer generieren keine Beschussmarken. Sobald alle Schilde heruntergefahren wurden, kann die Kriegsmaschine normal beschädigt werden und es werden Rettungswürfe gegen Trefferdurchgeführt. Treffer im Nahkampf ignorieren Deflektorschilde, aber Einheiten, die im Feuergefecht kämpfen, müssen zuerst alle Schilde herunterfahren, bevor siedie Kriegsmaschine beschädigen können.
Heruntergefahrene Deflektorschilde können repariert werden. Jede Kriegsmaschine kann in der Endphase ihres Zuges einen heruntergefahrenen Deflektorschild reparieren.

Zusätzlich kann eine Kriegsmaschine, wenn sie sich sammelt (entweder durch Ausführen einer Halten- oder Ordnen-Aktion), den Würfelwurf sowohl zum Reparieren von Deflektorschilden als auch zum Entfernen von Beschussmarken verwenden. Allerdings können nur die Hälfte der erzeugten Punkte (aufgerundet) für die Wiederherstellung von Deflektorschilden ausgegeben werden (zum Beispiel könnten Sie bei einer 3 drei Beschussmarken entfernen oder bis zu zwei Deflektorschilde reparieren und eine Beschussmarke entfernen).

rules.title: Gottgleiche Maschine
description: Kriegsmaschinen mit 8 oder mehr DC unterliegen den Sonderregeln Gottgleiche Maschine und Feuer aufteilen.

Die Pracht dieser ehrfurchtgebietenden Konstrukte hat ihren Preis, denn wenn eine solche Inkarnation der Macht wanken oder zerstört werden sollte, würden die befreundeten Streitmächte stark demoralisiert.

Aus diesem Grund erleiden alle befreundeten Verbände, wenn eine Einheit mit der Sonderregel Gottgleiche Maschine aufgerieben wird (einschließlich, wenn sie bereits aufgerieben ist, aber eine Offensive verliert), eine Beschussmarke. Immer wenn eine Einheit mit der Sonderregel Gottgleiche Maschine zerstört wird, erleiden alle befreundeten Verbände auf dem Schlachtfeld W3 Beschussmarken.
Einheiten mit der Sonderregel Gottgleiche Maschine sind selbst immun gegen diesen Effekt.

rules.title: Feuer aufteilen
description: Eine Kriegsmaschine mit dieser Sonderregel kann erklären, dass sie Feuer aufteilen wird, wenn sie versucht, eine Dauerfeuer oder Vorrücken Aktion auszuführen, wobei sie einen Modifikator von -1 auf den Wurf erleidet. Wenn die Aktion erfolgreich ist, kann die Kriegsmaschine auf bis zu zwei feindliche Vebände feuern, darf aber nicht mehr als einen Verband pro individueller Waffe anvisieren.

rules.title: Stampf' se' wech
description: Eine Kriegsmaschine mit dieser Sonderregel kann erklären, dass sie Feuer aufteilen wird, wenn sie versucht, eine Dauerfeuer oder Vorrücken Aktion auszuführen, wobei sie einen Modifikator von -1 auf den Wurf erleidet. Unabhängig ob die Aktion erfolgreich ist oder der Verband eine Halten Aktion durchfüren muss, kann die Kriegsmaschine auf bis zu zwei feindliche Vebände feuern, darf aber nicht mehr als einen Verband pro individueller Waffe anvisieren.

rules.title: Adeptus Custodes
description: Adeptus Custodes sind bekannt für ihre Hartnäckigkeit und Tapferkeit. Dies wird durch die folgenden Regeln dargestellt:
Es werden zwei Beschussmarken benötigt, um eine Adeptus Custodes Einheit zu unterdrücken.
Adeptus Custodes Verbände werden nur aufgerieben, wenn sie zwei Beschussmarken pro Einheit im Verband haben.

Verbände der Adeptus Custodes zählen nur die Hälfte ihrer Beschussmarken in der Ergebnisberechnung im Angriff (abgerundet – beachte das dies keinen Einfluss auf den Bonus von +1 für „Hat keine Beschussmarken“ hat).

Wenn sich ein aufgeriebener Adeptus Custodes Verband sammelt, erhält er eine Anzahl an Beschussmarken, welche der Anzahl der Einheiten entspricht, und nicht der Hälfte dieser Anzahl. Adeptus Custodes mit der Anführer Spezialfähigkeit entfernen zusätzlich zwei Beschussmarken statt einer.

Alle Adeptus Custodes-Einheiten gelten in allen Belangen als Furchtlos, außer dass sie ihren Bewegung außerhalb von 15 cm von einem feindlichen Verband aufgerieben sind. Wenn sie das nicht können, unterliegen sie den normalen Rückzug-Regeln von nicht-furchtlosen, aufgeriebenen Einheiten und werden innerhalb von 15 cm zu einer feindlichen Einheit ausgeschaltet.

rules.title: Hilfstransportschiff
description: Hilfstransportschiffe ähneln einer Mischung aus einem Antigrav Fahrzeug und einem Flugzeug. Sie bleiben hoch oben in der Luft, schweben aber über dem Schlachtfeld und schießen, wenn notwendig, über dazwischen liegendes Gelände. Die Hilfstransportschiffe Fähigkeit ist identisch mit denen einer aufgetauchten Antigrav Einheit. Hilfstransportschiffe können regulär beschossen werden, Flugabwehrwaffen sind nicht erforderlich. Bei einem Angriff erzwingen Hilfstransportschiffe automatisch ein Feuergefecht auf die gleiche Art und Weise, wie es auch Antigrav Einheiten tun können. Es wird davon ausgegangen, dass Hilfstransportschiffe oder die von ihnen transportierten Truppen entsprechend ausgerüstet sind, um wie gewohnt Truppen ein- und auszuladen. Truppen dürfen wie üblich einen Rettungswurf durchführen wenn das Hilfstransportschiff zerstört wird.

rules.title: Geisterherr
description: Ein Verband mit einem lebenden Ahnen erleidet keinen -1-Malus auf ihren Aktionswurf, wenn sie versuchen, die Initiative zu behalten.

rules.title: Tunneling Transports
description: Verbände, die Einheiten mit sowohl den Spezialregeln Transport als auch Tunnelgräber besitzen, müssen das Spiel in Reserve beginnen und dürfen das Schlachtfeld nur via Tunnelgräber betreten. Kriegsmaschinen mit diesen Spezialregeln dürfen nicht ohne Passagiere starten, sondern müssen einen andere Verband transportieren.

rules.title: Schildstörer
description: Jeder Treffer von einer Waffe mit der Schildstörer Eigenschaft fährt zwei Schpezialkraftfelder, Schattenfelder oder Deflektorschilde herunter. Wenn nur noch eines übrig ist, wird es heruntergefahren, aber der Treffer überträgt sich nicht. Darüber hinaus ignorieren Treffer mit der Schildstörer Eigenschaft Energiefeld und Ionenfelder.

rules.title: Tapferkeit
description: Alle Ritterverbände erhalten einen +1-Malus auf ihren Aktionswurf, wenn sie eine Offensive Aktion durchführen, und einen +1-Malus auf ihren Sammletest.

rules.title: Ritterlichkeit
description: Alle Ritterverbände erhalten einen +1-Malus auf ihren Aktionswurf, wenn sie eine Offensive oder Eilschritt Aktion durchführen, und einen +1-Malus auf ihren Sammletest.

rules.title: Hartnäckig
description: Jeder  Verband, in dem mindestens eine Einheit Hartnäckig ist, reduziert den durch Beschussmarken verursachten Schaden während der Verband aufgerieben istum eins, die Anzahl der zusätzlichen Treffer durch den Verlust eines Nahkampfs um eins, erfordert eine zusätzlichen Beschussmarke um den Verband aufzureiben und kann eine Beschussmarke ignorieren, wenn Unterdrücken bestimmt wird.

rules.title: Ionenfeld (x)
description: Ritter machen von Ionenfeldern Gebrauch, um Schuss- und Feuergefechtangriffe abzuwehren. Dadurch können sie einen Rettungswurf auf die Zahl in Klammern machen, wenn sie von Beschuss getroffen werden, anstatt ihren Rüstungswert zu verwenden.

Für diesen Rettungswurf gelten keine Modifikatoren, und er wird nicht von Makrowaffen-, Lanzen- und Titanen-Killer-Treffern beeinflusst. Jeder Schadenspunkt von einem Titanen-Killer-Treffer muss separat gerettet werden. Das Ionenfeld wird normal von Treffern mit der Eigenschaft Versprengen beeinflusst. Wenn die Einheit auch über Verstärkte Panzerung verfügt, darf sie einen fehlgeschlagenen Rettungswurf mit ihrem Rüstungswert wiederholen, es sei denn, der Treffer war eine Makrowaffe, Lanze oder Titanen-Killer.

Ionenfelder dürfen nur gegen Schüsse verwendet werden, es sei denn, der Verband befindet sich in einem Kreuzfeuer, und gegen Feuergefechtangriffe, es sei denn, der Treffer wird durch eine Einheit in Feuerunterstützung verursacht. Sie dürfen nicht gegen Nahkampfangriffe verwendet werden. Wenn relevant, würfelt Nahkampf- und Feuergefechtwürfel getrennt, wenn ihr Einheiten angreift, die mit Ionenfeldern ausgestattet sind.

rules.title: Ionisiertes Blitzfeld
description: Ritter mit 'Ionisiertes Blitzfeld' dürfen ihr Ionenfeld auch gegen Nahkampfattacken nutzen.

rules.title: Schildbohrer
description: Waffen mit der 'Schildbohrer' Sonderregel ignorieren Energiefelder, Ionenfelder, Schpezialkraftfelder, Schattenfelder und Deflektorschilde (Schattenfelder geben weiterhin den Deckungsbonus gegen Beschuss).

rules.title: Warpenergie
description: Waffen mit der 'Warpenergie' Sonderregel ignorieren Schpezialkraftfelder, Schattenfelder, Deflektorschilde, Energiefelder, Ionenfelder und unmodifizierte Rettungswürfe (Schattenfelder geben weiterhin den Deckungsbonus gegen Beschuss).

rules.title: Lightning Charge
description: Weapon oder Unit gains First Strike during engages initiated by the formation.

rules.title: Unstable
description: If a natural 1 is rolled when rolling to hit, roll another dice. If the result is yet another natural 1, the wielder is destroyed.

rules.title: Mut, Disziplin und Loyalität
description: Wenn der Oberbefehlshaber-Wiederholungswurf auf einen Verband angewendet wird, welcher einen Kommissar oder einen Ministorum-Priester enthält, hat der Verband als Initiative-Wert von 1+ beim Wiederholungswurf des Aktionswurfs.

rules.title: Grim Demeanour
description: Valhallan Verbände that contain a Ministorum Priest gain +1 on their Action Test when attempting to Marshal.

rules.title: Gravschirme
description: Units with the Gravschirme Sonderregel may disembark within 10cm of a Antigrav transport vehicles instead of the normal 5cm.

rules.title: Ethereal
description: All units in a formation joined by an Ethereal gain Furchtlos. When the unit with the Ethereal is killed the formation loses Furchtlos und receives 1D3 Beschussmarke.

rules.title: Catachanischer Befehlshaber
description: When the Oberbefehlshaber re-roll is used on any formation containing a Catachanischer Oberbefehlshaber oder Catachanischer Befehlshaber, the formation counts as having 1+ Initiative Rating when re-rolling the Action Test

rules.title: Fortified Positions
description: Fortified Positions are set up at the same time as the formation they are bought with. Units from such Verbände must be set up within the fortified positions, so that no space is left empty. All pieces of fortified positions must be within 5cm from another piece. Once set up, Fortified Positions counts as terrain that do not block Line of Sight, und may be used by either side. Units of INF that benefit from Cover inside a Fortified Position may only be Barged by WE in such a way that they are not moved outside of their Fortified Position.
Gun Emplacement: Provides a Cover Save of 4+ eine unit of INF, oder a 5+ Cover Save to eine unit of AV oder LV (but not H-AV).
Bunker: Provides a Cover Save of 3+ und Verstärkte Heckpanzerung to bis zu drei units of INF. Counts as Dangerous Terrain für AV und WE. Bunkers can be a maximum of 8cm x 8cm in size.
Trench: Provides a cover save of 4+ to INF. May contain eine unit of INF pro 4cm of lenght. Counts as Dangerous Terrain für AV.

Razor Wire: Counts as Dangerous Terrain für all INF, including those that have the Beritten Sonderregel. Razor Wire dangerous terrain tests may not be re-rolled using the Geländegängig ability (units may still 'move carefully' through such terrain). Razor Wire must be set up so that every piece touches another piece from the same group, with no gap in between.

Minefields: Counts as Dangerous Terrain für all types of units. Minefield dangerous terrain tests may not be re-rolled using the Geländegängig ability (units may still 'move carefully' through such terrain). Skimmers und units with 'Sprungmodule' moving over Minefields must also take dangerous terrain tests. Minefields must be set up so that every piece touches another piece from the same group, with no gap in between.

rules.title: Baran Regiments HQ
description: When playing Epic tournament games, a Siegemaster army must include a Regiments HQ. The enemy counts as having achieved the “Break Their Spirit” goal by destroying this formation oder by destroying the most expensive formation in the army (see Victory Conditions).

rules.title: Air Superiority
description: Elysianische Sturmtruppen may ignore eine Beschussmarke when rolling to activate aircraft Verbände.

In addition, Elysianische Sturmtruppen may instead of starting with garrisons on overwatch place aircrafts on Combat Air Patrol.  Bis zu zwei Verbände may start on overwatch oder CAP. Aircraft formation placed on CAP in this way will follow all the normal rules für CAP, but are setup during the pre-game garrisoning phase.

rules.title: Deep Strike
description: An Elysianische Sturmtruppen army that includes a Spacecraft may deploy Verbände transported in Valkyries, Vendettas oder Sky Talons in the Spacecraft. A Lunar-Klasse Kreuzer can hold eine formation, und a Imperator-Klasse Schlachtschiff bis zu zwei Verbände. All transport vehicles in a formation deployed in a Spacecraft gains the Planetfall Sonderregel. Roll für scatter individually für jeweils transport vehicle.
Before jeweils game, after the opposing army is known but before objectives are placed, the Imperial Guard player may choose which formation(s), if any, that should be deployed in the Spaceship.

rules.title: Siege Specialists
description: Units may re-roll failed dangerous terrain tests when making a move through Minefields oder Razor Wire on the friendly part of the table, und units with Geländegängig may use it against Minefields oder Razor Wire on the enemy part of the table.
In addition, bis zu drei Verbände that garrison may start on Overwatch instead of the usual zwei.

rules.title: Belagerungsmeister
description: Units may re-roll failed dangerous terrain tests when making a move through Minefields oder Razor Wire on the friendly part of the table, und units with 'Geländegängig' may use it against Minefields oder Razor Wire on the enemy part of the table.

In addition, bis zu drei Verbände that garrison may start on Overwatch instead of the usual zwei, und bis zu zwei Verbände that garrison ignore the requirement to have eine unit within 15cm of an objective on the friendly half of the table.

rules.title: Tunnelgräber
description: Tunnellers may be set up touching their own side's table edge before the battle starts at the same time that spacecraft are set up (see 4.3.1). Any units transported in tunnellers should be placed to eine side at this time too. Secretly write down the location where the tunneller will surface at the same time und in the same manner that you record the coordinates of a drop zone (see 4.3.1). You must also secretly record the turn the tunneller will surface. If it is going to surface within 30cm of a table edge within the deployment zone, it may arrive from the first turn. If it is going to surface within 65cm of a table edge within the deployment zone, it may appear on turn zwei. It can appear on any part of the battlefield from the third turn.

Set up the tunneller units at the start of the stated turn, before determining who wins the strategy roll, at the location you wrote down. Surfacing does not Zählt als movement für the purposes of triggering enemy overwatch fire. If a tunneller would have surfaced on terrain that is impassable für it, under a friendly unit, oder in an enemy zone of control, then it is assumed that on-board sensor equipment would divert it towards another entry point. The unit should be moved to the nearest area where it can surface.

Verbände of multiple tunnellers need only record eine location where they will surface. Place the first tunneller unit at this location. All other tunneller units must be placed within 5cm of another tunneller unit that has already been placed und fully within a 15cm radius of the original surfacing coordinates, which can be beyond where tunnellers could appear that turn. Tunnelgräber do not have to roll für dangerous oder difficult terrain when they appear. After all tunnellers have been placed any units being transported are allowed to disembark immediately, und may disembark on the enemy half of the table (if they appear in turn 2).
Disembarking triggers overwatch fire as normal. Tunnellers, und any units being transported in them, may take an action on the turn they appear.

rules.title: Self Planetfall
description: Self Planetfall is plotted exactly as planetfall (see 4.4). Both the turn in which the formation arrives und the landing location is plotted. The only exception is that, because these units are much smaller than orbiting spacecraft, they may be plotted to arrive in the same turn that another spacecraft is present. On the designated turn the formation conducting Self Planetfall is activated in the normal activation sequence, as with spacecraft. Nominate the action für the formation und roll to activate. If the formation fails to activate its arrival is delayed to the next following turn. If the activation is successful, place the formation at the plotted landing zone und determine scatter according to 4.4 as if it were a normal planetfall, including loaded units disembarking bis zu 5cm. The formation’s action proceeds as normal in all respects from that point. In other words, the formation gets the “free move” from planetfall placement at the beginning of its action but in all other ways activates as normal. Note: The action is chosen at activation, before scatter is determined. Choose the action carefully as a poor scatter roll could render some actions ineffective.

rules.title: Gläubig
description: When performing an Engage that leads to an Assault (i.e. at least eine unit is within 15cm of an enemy unit), units that have the 'Gläubig' Sonderregel gain Furchtlos, und the formation counts as having eine additional character with the 'Inspirierend' Sonderregel. These effects lasts until the end of the current turn, but are lost if all units with 'Gläubig' in the formation are destroyed.

rules.title: Bionics
description: The extensive bionic modifications undergone by the Iron Hands und the Iron Warriors increases their resistance to physical trauma. Characters with the Bionics Sonderregel increases the Armour of their unit to 3+ when added to a unit of INF.

rules.title: Notreparaturen
description: As long as a formation contains a unit with the 'Notreparaturen' special ability, all Armoured Vehicle units in the formation gains Unmodifizierter Rettungswurf.

rules.title: Extended Command
description: Verbände with at least eine unit with the 'Extended Command' ability extend the range at which Befehlshabers within the formation can call other Verbände to follow them when they make a combined assault from 5cm to 15cm (see 2.1.2).

rules.title: They Shall Know No Fear
description: Space Marines are renowned für their tenacity und Tapferkeit. This is represented by the following rules:

• It takes 2 Beschussmarke to suppress a Space Marine unit oder kill a unit in a broken formation (ignore any leftover Beschussmarke)
  • Space Marine Verbände are only broken if they have 2 Beschussmarke pro unit in the formation.
  • Space Marines Verbände only count half their number of Blaster markers in assault resolution (rounding down to a minimum of eine). Halve the number of extra hits suffered by a Space Marine formation that loses an assault, rounding down in favour of the Space Marines.
  • When a broken Space Marine formation rallies, it receives a number of Beschussmarke equal to the number of units, rather than half this number.

rules.title: Space Marine Transports
description: The Space Marines are a highly mobile army. Because of this, the Punkte cost of a detachment usually includes enough Rhino transport vehicles to transport it und any Erweiterungen that have been taken. Determine the number of Rhinos needed after all Erweiterungen have been purchased. The number of Rhinos will always be the minimum needed to carry the formation, you can’t take extras along to cover any losses!

Note that many Verbände don’t receive Rhinos, usually because they can’t fit into them. Detachments that come with Rhinos will be noted as having plus transport in the units section of the army list opposite.

Also note that you don’t have to take Rhinos if you don’t want to. If you’d rather field the formation on foot instead, so it can act as a garrison für example, oder be transported in a Thunderhawk, then you may do so.

In addition, you may choose to replace a detachment’s Rhinos with Drop Pods. If you do this then the detachment will enter play in a Drop Pod using the rules für Planetfall (see Planetfall). Note that if you choose to do this you will also require a Space Marine Strike Cruiser oder Battle Barge to deploy the Drop Pods from.

Before jeweils game, after the opposing army is known but before objectives are placed, the Space Marine player may choose which Verbände with the plus transport aspect are deployed in Rhinos, Drop Pods oder on foot. If the formation has any units unable to deploy in Drop Pods then that option cannot be selected.

rules.title: Grey Ritters Transports
description: Grey Ritters Verbände with 'plus transport' may take Grey Ritters Rhinos instead of normal Rhinos.

rules.title: Imperial Fists Transports
description: The Imperial Fists are a highly mobile army. Because of this, the Punkte cost of a detachment usually includes enough Rhino transport vehicles to transport it und any Erweiterungen that have been taken. Determine the number of Rhinos needed after all Erweiterungen have been purchased. The number of Rhinos will always be the minimum needed to carry the formation, you can’t take extras along to cover any losses!

Note that many Verbände don’t receive Rhinos, usually because they can’t fit into them. Detachments that come with Rhinos will be noted as having plus transport in the units section of the army list opposite.
Also note that you don’t have to take Rhinos if you don’t want to. If you’d rather field the formation on foot instead, so it can act as a garrison für example, then you may do so.

Before jeweils game, after the opposing army is known but before objectives are placed, the Imperial Fists player may choose which Verbände with the plus transport aspect are deployed in Rhinos oder on foot.

rules.title: Im Sattel geboren
description: White Scars are masters of lightning-fast hit-und-run attacks, never allowing the enemy to force a decisive oder static engagement. Units with Im Sattel geboren may consolidate 15cm instead of the usual 5cm.

rules.title: Schnell wie der Wind
description: Units with Schnell wie der Wind ignore the -1 to hit penalty on shooting when carrying out a double action, but do not gain the +1 to hit bonus on shooting when carrying out a sustained fire action.

rules.title: White Scars Transports
description: The White Scars are an exceptionally mobile army. Because of this the Punkte cost of a detachment usually includes enough transport vehicles to transport it und any Erweiterungen that have been taken. The number of vehicles will always be the minimum needed to carry the formation, you can’t take extras along to cover any losses!

Note that many Verbände don’t receive transports, usually because they can’t fit into them. Detachments that come with vehicles will be noted as having 'plus transport'. White Scars detachments must take the transport vehicles für a detachment. You cannot leave them behind in order to use the unit as a garrison, to use Teleportieren oder in order to be deployed by a Thunderhawk.

In addition, you may choose to replace a detachment’s Rhinos with Drop Pods. If you do this then the detachment will enter play in a Drop Pod using the rules für Planetfall (see Planetfall). Note that if you choose to do this you will also require a Space Marine Strike Cruiser oder Battle Barge to deploy the Drop Pods from.

Before jeweils game, after the opposing army is known but before objectives are placed, the White Scars player may choose which Verbände with the plus transport aspect are deployed in Rhinos oder Drop Pods. If the formation has any units unable to deploy in Drop Pods then that option cannot be selected.

rules.title: Navis Bossilite
description: Grey Ritter spacecraft are among the fastest und best piloted ships in the Galaxy. If a Grey Ritters Strike Cruiser has been bought, the Blood Ravens player counts as having a Strategy Rating of 6 für the purposes of choosing which turn the spacecraft will pass over the battlefield.

rules.title: Ad Hoc Detachments
description: By necessity, the Ordo Xenos has become experts of improvisation, rapidly mustering local allies und adapting to the Deathwatch's ever-changing roster of skills und individuals. Für this reason, Verbände with Befehlshaber may also use the ability when their own oder another friendly formation within 5cm of their formation is defending against an assault, declaring both Verbände to be intermingled (see 1.12.10). Once declared intermingled, the Befehlshabers' Verbände follow all rules exactly as if the enemy had declared them intermingled. Note that if either player declares intermingling, the Verbände are intermingled.

rules.title: Wings of the Sky Angel
description: All Deathwatch Detachments must start the game in the reserves, transported in either a Dark Hunter Class Destroyer, a Corvus Blackstar Dropship, oder a Deathwatch Thunderhawk Transporter.
In addition, all AA shots have einen zusätzlichen -1 to hit against Corvus Blackstar Dropships.

rules.title: Descent of Angels
description: Units in a formation with Stormravens does not have to roll für scatter when using the Planetfall Sonderregel. Place the first Stormraven within 15cm of the pre-plotted drop zone co-ordinates und place all other units in the formation within 15cm of this unit und in coherency. Units may not be placed in impassable terrain oder enemy zones of control.

rules.title: Lucifer Pattern Engine
description: Units with the Lucifer Pattern Engine Sonderregel gain einen zusätzlichen 5cm speed when carrying out an Engage action.

rules.title: Blood Angels Rhinos
description: Blood Angels Verbände with 'plus transport' may take Blood Angels Rhinos instead of normal Rhinos.

rules.title: Pack Mentality
description: Space Wolves Packs counts as having eine character with the Inspirierend Sonderregel when they initiate an assault where they have another formation with the Pack Mentality Sonderregel in support.

rules.title: Apocalyptic Barrage
description: Uses the Orbital Barrage Template instead of the ordinary template.

rules.title: Independent
description: The Independent Sonderregel allows a Kriegsmaschine formation to operate as zwei independent Kriegsmaschinen für all purposes, including für determining the army BTS (jeweils unit counts as its own formation worth half of the Punkte value of the original formation, including Erweiterungen). If eine of the zwei Kriegsmaschinen are destroyed, the surviving eine immediately recieves a Beschussmarke.

rules.title: Telemetrieempfänger
description: Units that Teleportieren within 15cm from a friendly, unbroken unit with Telemetrieempfänger (except from teleporting Verbände) may re-roll 1:s when testing für Teleportieren Mishap.

In addition, Verbände that exclusively consists of models with Teleportieren may be set up in a spacecraft if such has been bought. From there, they can either Teleportieren normally, oder coordinate their Teleportieren with the spacecraft's activation.

Teleports coordinated mit einemspacecraft activation happen after Orbital Barrage, Pin-Points und all events related to Verbände making Planetfall has been resolved. All such teleports counts as taking place simultaneously, not eine after another. The entire formation must be placed within 15cm of a unit with the Telemetrieempfänger Sonderregel. If they are unable oder unwilling to do so they must wait und Teleportieren normally in later turns.

rules.title: Honour Guard
description: Units with the Honour Guard Sonderregel are Furchtlos as long as their formation contains a character with the Oberbefehlshaber Sonderregel. If they are in the same formation, the Oberbefehlshaber may be added to a unit with this Sonderregel.

rules.title: Land Speeder Escort
description: All types of Land Speeders bought as part of the 'Raven Guard Land Speeders' upgrade gain the Planetfall Sonderregel (only roll to scatter once für the entire formation). In addition, such Land Speeders may start the game transported in an air transport, taking up no transport space, und Zählt als having the Sprungmodule Sonderregel when disembarking their transport. They may not be picked up again once on the battlefield.

rules.title: Expert Reconnaissance
description: Friendly Raven Guard Verbände that enter the battlefield through Planetfall that are placed within 30cm of a unit with the Expert Reconnaissance Sonderregel does not roll für scatter. In addition, friendly Raven Guard Verbände that enter the battlefield through Teleportieren und are placed within 15cm of a unit with the Expert Reconnaissance Sonderregel may re-roll 1:s when testing für Teleportieren Mishap.

rules.title: Fleet of Foot
description: Dark Eldar und Harlequin Verbände gain +1 when attempting to make a March action. In addition, they may still lend support fire in assaults, help claim a crossfire bonus, und fire AA after taking a March action.

rules.title: Black Heart Coterie
description: The army must include a Black Heart Coterie. The enemy counts as having achieved the ‘Break Their Spirit’ (BTS) victory condition if they destroy this formation oder the most expensive formation in the army.

rules.title: Wraithkind Coterie
description: The army must include a Wraithkind Coterie. The enemy counts as having achieved the ‘Break Their Spirit’ (BTS) victory condition if they destroy this formation und/oder the most expensive formation in the army.

rules.title: Webway Portal
description: A army that includes any Webway Portals may place bis zu drei Verbände in reserve, Infanterie Einheiten in these reserve Verbände may Zählt als Beritten in their transports. These Verbände may enter play by activating und moving onto the table through a friendly Webway Portal during the game, measuring their first move from any part of the position the portal occupies on the battlefield.

A Webway Portal may only be used once pro turn, und if the formation fails to activate when attempting to enter via a Webway, it may only take a hold action offboard und regroup. Only INF, LV, oder AVs with the Geländegängig ability may use Webway Portals. H-AV units may not use portals unless noted otherwise.
Jeweils time a formation uses a broken Portal it receives eine Beschussmarke.

If a Webway is in an enemy zone of control, any formation that enters through it must Engage that formation(s). In addition, if it is also directly under an enemy formation, any formation that enters must maximize base contact as much as possible.

rules.title: Large Webway Portal
description: Large Webway Portals follows all the rules für a normal Webway Portals, except AV units are not required to have Geländegängig in order to enter the battlefield through it.

rules.title: Schattenfelder
description: Jeweils Schattenfeld will automatically stop eine point of damage und then go down. Do not make armour saves für damage stopped by Schattenfelder, oder allocate Beschussmarke. Once all of a vehicle oder war engine’s Schattenfelder have been knocked down, it may be damaged normally und you may make saving throws against any hits that are scored. Hits from close combat ignore Schattenfelder but units using their firefight values must first knock down any Schattenfelder before they can cause any damage. While a vehicle oder war engine has at least eine operating Schattenfeld it counts as being obscured (1.8.2), meaning that all shooting (including AA) without the Ignore Cover ability receive a -1 to hit modifier.

rules.title: Seers of Ulthwé
description: Seers of Ulthwé - Craftworld Ulthwé armies counts as having Strategy Rating 5 für all purposes except für the Strategy Roll at the start of a turn.

rules.title: Great Drake

The Great Drake counts as its own formation und may only enter play in this manner.

While on the table, the Great Drake may only contest objectives. Remove the Great Drake in the End Phase of the turn it arrived, before rallying Verbände oder counting objectives. Once removed it may not return.

rules.title: Farsight
description: Eldar Verbände that include a unit with the Farsight ability may ignore the -1 penalty to Action test rolls when attempting to retain the Initiative.

In addition once pro turn the Eldar player may attempt to retain the Initiative twice in a row (i.e. allowing the Eldar player to take 3 activations in a row). Any Eldar formation may be selected, including those without a unit with Farsight, but at least eine unit with the Farsight ability must be in play on the battlefield.
The formation selected must still carry out an Action Test mit einem-1 modifier, unless the selected formation has a unit with the Farsight ability.

rules.title: Hit und Run
description: Eldar/Dark Eldar/Harlequin Verbände that perform an Advance oder Double action may choose to shoot either before oder after jeweils move, but may still only shoot once. If the formation chooses to Double the -1 to hit penalty applies even if the shot is taken before moving. In addition, Verbände that win an assault may consolidate bis zu their speed value rather than the normal 5cms.

rules.title: Holofields (x)
description: Holofields provide a saving throw to the value of 'x'. This save may always be taken even against Waffen mit derMacro Weapon oder Titan Killer abilities.

If a unit has Verstärkte Panzerung it may use its re-roll unless hit by a Lanze, Macro Weapon oder Titan Killer attack but the re-roll uses the units armour value. Hits saved by the Holofield do not generate Beschussmarke, even if they have the Disrupt ability.
Against Titan Killer attacks that cause extra damage make eine Holofield save roll, if this is successful the unit takes no damage, if the roll fails it suffers all the damage.

Holofield saves can be reduced by modifiers such as the -1 to saves from a cross fire und Waffen mit derScharfschütze ability. If a unit with Holofield also has a save from being in Cover, it must choose which save to use.

rules.title: Lanze
description: When units with Verstärkte Panzerung are hit by a weapon with the Lanze ability they do not get to re-roll failed armour saves.

rules.title: Independent Twins
description: Allows a formation of Revenant Titans to operate as zwei independent Kriegsmaschinen für all purposes, including für determining the army BTS. If eine of the pair is destroyed, the surviving Revenant Synchronisierter receives a Beschussmarke.
In addition, Independent Twins may use the Befehlshaber ability with its Synchronisierter. In this case, the Befehlshaber ability counts as having an unlimited range instead of the normal 5cm.

rules.title: Cegorach, the Laughing God
description: As long as there is at least eine Solitaire present on the battlefield, all enemy non-Harlequin Verbände counts as being within 30cm of an enemy unit für the purposes of rally tests during the End Phase.

rules.title: Shadowsight
description: Units that Teleportieren within 15cm from a friendly, unbroken unit with Shadowsight may re-roll 1:s when testing für Teleportieren Mishap. This also applies when the unit with Shadowsight is Teleporting.

rules.title: Masters of the Webway
description: Harlequins are the unparallelled masters of the Webway. They must start the game in the reserves, und may only enter the battlefield by Teleporting oder by using a Wraithgate. Harlequins may re-roll 1:s when testing für Teleportieren Mishap.

rules.title: Dance of Shadows

rules.title: Summoning
description: Any formation that either has a unit with Daemonic Pact oder a Daemonic Pact formation upgrade may summon Daemons. Jeweils Daemonic Pact in the army automatically provides eine point to the Lesser Daemon Pool at the start of the battle (the player may also purchase additional Lesser Daemon Pool Punkte und/oder Greater Daemon Pool Punkte).

Daemon Pools are not faction specific. The size of the Daemon Pools must be visible to all players at all times und it is suggested that either tokens oder dice are used to indicate the size of the pool. As daemons are summoned the pool must be changed to reflect its current size.

To summon daemons the formation declares its intention to summon before any action roll is made (but after the choice of action). If the formation that wishes to Summon is being transported inside another formation (e.g. a Chaos Thunderhawk) it cannot choose to Summon when the Chaos Thunderhawk prepares to activate.

The player then rolls 2D3 to generate the number of Summoning Points available für this formation. The formation may then summon daemons bis zu the number of Summoning Points generated, with any Punkte not used lost, bis zu the number of Lesser oder Greater Daemon Pool Punkte left.

Summoned units must be setup with their base completely within 5cm of any non-summoned unit in the summoning formation (i.e. You cannot place a chain of summoned units). If the summoning formation has the Transport ability, newly summoned units can be set up inside if there is space left. They cannot be placed in enemy zones of control oder impassable terrain. Summoned units become part of the summoning formation für all rules purposes as long as they remain on the battlefield.

Summoned Lesser Daemons are Entbehrlich, but they are otherwise counted as normal units, und are included when working out if a formation outnumbers an opponent in an assault oder is broken by Beschussmarke, etc. Note that Daemons that are killed in an assault do count towards the number of units killed by the enemy when working out modifiers für assault resolution.

Summoned units remain in play until the End Phase of the turn in which they were summoned. After all Verbände have attempted to rally any summoned units are removed from play und the total of their Daemon Pool cost is returned to the relevant Daemon Pool. This may cause the formation to break, if the number of Beschussmarke now equals oder exceeds the number of units in the formation.
When a formation becomes broken all its summoned units are destroyed.

When calculating victory Punkte, the Lesser Daemon Pool scores half Punkte if the pool has less than oder equal to half (round up) its original number of daemons remaining. The Lesser Daemon Pool scores full Punkte if the pool has less than oder equal to a quarter (round up) its daemons remaining. Treat Greater Daemons as Kriegsmaschinen für the purpose of calculating victory Punkte.

Greater Daemons: Slaanesh Keeper of Secrets (8), Nurgle Great Unclean Ein (8), Khorne Bloodthirster (8), Tzeentch Lord of Change (8)

description: Verbände in a Daemonic Incursion army may summon Lesser Daemons from the power they are aligned with. They do not need an upgrade to do so. Cultist Coven Verbände are aligned with all powers present in the army at the start of the battle. (Brackets indicating the Summoning Points cost):

Lesser Daemon Pool Punkte that was bought as part of a formation are counted towards that formation's starting units.

rules.title: Augment Summoning (+x)
description: Units with Augment Summoning (+x) add a number of summoning Punkte equal to 'x' when the formation they are in summons daemons (see Summoning). Für example, a unit noted as having Augment Summoning (+2) would allow a formation mit einemDaemonic Pact to roll 2D3+2 für summoning Punkte as opposed to the usual 2D3.

rules.title: Daemonic Focus
description: Units with Daemonic focus may keep any oder all summoned units that belong to the formation in play. Summoned units do not vanish back into the warp after the formation has attempted to rally. Daemonic Focus may not be used to keep summoned units in play if the formation is broken. Multiples of Daemonic Focus have no additional effect.

rules.title: Fickle Masters
description: In the Strategy Phase of jeweils turn if the Chaos player rolls a 6, they are rewarded with 1 summoning point to add to the Lesser Daemon Pool. However, if a 1 is rolled, 1 summoning Punkte is lost from the Lesser Daemon Pool. In the latter case, if no Lesser Daemon Pool has been purchased, oder if it is empty, then there is no effect.

rules.title: Changer of Ways
description: Verbände containing Thousands Sons Daemon Princes und Scarab Occult Terminatoren may only contain units of INF und AV units with Geländegängig, und must be held in the reserves at the start of the game. Such Verbände may only enter the Battlefield through a Warp Rift.

rules.title: Daemon Engine (x)
description: Verbände where at least eine unit has the Daemon Engine (x) Sonderregel gain the bonus associated with that faction:

• Chaos Undivided: Formation ignores the -1 modifier für enemy Verbände within 30cm when rallying.
  • Khorne: Formation gains +1 to activate when attempting to Engage.
  • Nurgle: Formation gains +1 to activate when attempting to Marshal.
  • Slaanesh: Formation gains +1 to activate when attempting to Double.
  • Tzeentch: Formation gains +1 to activate when attempting to Advance.

rules.title: Black Legion Dreadclaws
description: Dreadclaws allow a Chaos formation to enter play using the planetfall rules if a spaceship has been purchased to carry them. Units in a formation with Dreadclaws deploy using the planetfall rules but do not roll für scatter. Place the first unit within 15cm of the pre-plotted drop zone co-ordinates und place all other units in the formation within 15cm of this unit und in coherency. Units may not be placed in impassable terrain oder enemy zones of control.
The following units may be deployed using Dreadclaws: Noise Marines, Rubric Marines, Khorne Berzerkers, Plague Marines, Chaos Space Marines, Havocs, Chaos Terminatoren, Kyborgs, Chaos Cybots.

rules.title: Night Lords Dreadclaws
description: Dreadclaws allow a Chaos formation to enter play using the planetfall rules if a spaceship has been purchased to carry them. Units in a formation with Dreadclaws deploy using the planetfall rules but do not roll für scatter. Place the first unit within 15cm of the pre-plotted drop zone co-ordinates und place all other units in the formation within 15cm of this unit und in coherency. Units may not be placed in impassable terrain oder enemy zones of control.
The following units may be deployed using Dreadclaws: Night Lords Assault Marines, Atramentar Terminatoren, Night Lords Cybots.

rules.title: Infestation
description: Verbände completely made up of units with the Infestation Sonderregel must be held in reserve und deployed using the Teleportieren rules. In addition, units with the Infestation Sonderregel may only contest scenario objectives.

rules.title: LatD Eternal Animosity
description: Jeweils Support Coven in a Lost und the Damned army owes allegiance to either eine of the Ruinous Powers oder to Chaos Undivided. With the exception of Chaos Undivided, the different factions harbour eternal animosity against jeweils other. This state of affairs is represented by the following rules:
A Lost und the Damned army with Verbände belonging to the faction of Khorne may not include Verbände from the faction of Slaanesh (und vice-versa).
A Lost und the Damned army with Verbände belonging to the faction of Nurgle may not include Verbände from the faction of Tzeentch (und vice-versa).

rules.title: StD Eternal Animosity
description: Jeweils Dark Mechanicus allied formation in a Slaves to Darkness army owes allegiance to either eine of the Ruinous Powers oder to Chaos Undivided. rules.title: Reign of Chaos
description: During the Strategy Phase the Daemon Incursion player rolls 2d6 und picks the highest. In addition add the dice together und consult the following table:
(2-3) *Chaotic Ebb* All Daemon Legion units (friend und foe) loses their Unmodifizierter Rettungswurf für the rest of the turn.
(4-5) *The Winds Recede* All players that can summon Daemons lose 1D3 Lesser Daemons Pool Punkte. Daemon Incursion players lose einen zusätzlichen D3. If the pool is empty nothing happens.
(6-8) *Auge des Sturms* Nothing happens.
(9-10) *The Winds Wax* All players that can summon Daemons gains 1D3 Lesser Daemons Pool Punkte. Daemon Incursion players gains einen zusätzlichen D3.
(11-12) *Chaotic Surge* All Daemon Legion units (friend und foe) improves their Unmodifizierter Rettungswurf to 5+ für the rest of the turn.

rules.title: The Great Ritual
description: All Exalted Greater Daemons und all Daemon Legion Verbände must be held in the reserves at the start of the game. Exalted Greater Daemons may either enter the battlefield through a Warp Rift, oder they can enter through a Chaos Gate (even if they had previously plotted a Warp Rift). Daemon Legion Verbände may only enter the battlefield through a Chaos Gate.

rules.title: Terror From Beyond
description: All Exalted Greater Daemon Verbände must be destroyed in order für the opponent to claim the Daemonic Incursion BTS objective. All Exalted Greater Daemon Verbände in the reserves are destroyed if they are still there during the End Phase of turn 3.

In addition, as long as the Daemon Incursion army still contains any Exalted Greater Daemons it may re-roll a single failed Initiative test of any type once pro turn. If all Exalted Greater Daemons are in the Reserves they may only use the re-roll on themselves.

rules.title: Daemonic Instability
description: When any Exalted Greater Daemon formation oder Daemon Legions formation becomes broken für any reason, it is immediately destroyed.

rules.title: Warp Rift
description: Verbände with at least eine model with the Warp Rift Sonderregel must start the game in the reserves, und may only enter the battlefield through a Warp Rift oder a Chaos Gate.

Warp Rifts are plotted exactly as Self Planetfall. Both the turn in which the formation arrives und the landing coordinates must be recorded. The turn jeweils formation arrives does not have to be announced.
The plotted coordinates of the Warp Rift must be located within 60cm from the friendly Blitz objective if the formation arrives in turn eine, und anywhere on the battlefield on turn zwei oder drei.
On the designated turn the Warp Rift formation is activated in the normal activation sequence, as with Self Planetfall.

First the action für the formation must be decided. After this roll to summon daemons, und then roll to activate. If the formation fails to activate it must take a Hold action. It may then either enter the battlefield through any available Chaos Gate, oder its arrival is delayed to the following turn, und it remains in the reserves.
If the activation is successful, place a Warp Rift token at the plotted coordinates. It does not scatter.

If a Warp Rift would open on terrain that is impassable für units in the formation that will enter through it, under a friendly unit, oder in an enemy zone of control, then it is assumed that will divert towards another entry point. The location für the Warp Rift should be moved to the nearest point where it can open.

Finally, the activated formation carries out the order determined at the start of its action, und must move the formation out of the Warp Rift. Measure all distances from the centre point of the token.
All units from the activating formation must move out of the Warp Rift. Any units that are unable to exit the Warp Rift are destroyed. The Warp Rift token is then removed from the battlefield.

rules.title: Chaos Gate
description: Daemonic Incursion Verbände that are located in the Reserves may use Chaos Gates to enter the battlefield. Any number of Verbände can use a Chaos Gate pro turn if it is part of an objective, but only eine formation pro turn can use a Chaos Gate Beritten on a Kriegsmaschine.

First the action für the formation must be decided. After this roll to summon daemons, und then roll to activate. If the formation fails to activate it must take a Hold action. It may then either enter the battlefield through any available Chaos Gate, oder choose to remain in the reserves.
Chaos Gates that are part of objectives cannot be destroyed, while Chaos Gates Beritten on Kriegsmaschinen are destroyed if that Kriegsmaschine is destroyed.

Any formation that enters the battlefield through a Chaos Gate Beritten on a Kriegsmaschine that is broken recieves a Beschussmarke. Measure all movement from the Chaos Gate from the centre of the token, oder the edge of the Kriegsmaschine.

If a Chaos Gate is in an enemy zone of control, any formation that enters through it must Engage that formation(s). In addition, if it is also directly under an enemy formation, any formation that enters must maximize base contact as much as possible.

rules.title: The Harrowing
description: Alpha Legion armies counts as having Strategy Rating 5 für all purposes except für the Strategy Roll at the start of a turn.

rules.title: Sabotage
description: Before rolling für the first turn und before teleports the player may select eine enemy formation pro formation of containing at least eine unit with the 'Sabotage' Sonderregel (both Verbände must have been deployed on the battlefield) und roll a D6.

On 2-5, the enemy formation begins the game mit einemBeschussmarke. On a roll of 6, it begins with d3 Beschussmarke. On a roll of 1, the formation with 'Sabotage' recieves a Beschussmarke. No formation may be subject to Sabotage more than once, even if the first roll is a 1.

rules.title: Alpha Legion Transports
description: The Alpha Legion are a highly mobile army. Because of this, the Punkte cost of a detachment usually includes enough Rhino transport vehicles to transport it und any Erweiterungen that have been taken. Determine the number of Rhinos needed after all Erweiterungen have been purchased. The number of Rhinos will always be the minimum needed to carry the formation, you can’t take extras along to cover any losses!

Note that many Verbände don’t receive Rhinos, usually because they can’t fit into them. Detachments that come with Rhinos will be noted as having plus transport in the units section of the army list opposite.

Also note that you don’t have to take Rhinos if you don’t want to. If you’d rather field the formation on foot instead, so it can act as a garrison für example, oder be transported in a Storm Eagle, then you may do so.

In addition, you may choose to replace a detachment’s Rhinos with Drop Pods. If you do this then the detachment will enter play in a Drop Pods using the rules für Planetfall (see Planetfall). Note that if you choose to do this you will also require a Chaos Strike Cruiser deploy the Drop Pods from.

Before jeweils game, after the opposing army is known but before objectives are placed, the Alpha Legion player may choose which Verbände with the plus transport aspect are deployed in Rhinos, Drop Pods oder on foot. If the formation has any units unable to deploy in Drop Pods then that option cannot be selected.

rules.title: In Midnight Clad
description: Furies of Chaos Undivided that are killed in an assault do not count für Combat Resolution as long as the controlling Night Lords player initiated the assault.

rules.title: Klauen Forever Red
description: In addition to being counted für suppression, Night Lords units may also use Handfeuerwaffen to shoot. While incapable of doing direct damage, this will still inflict a Beschussmarke on enemy Verbände that come under fire.

rules.title: Necron Reserves
description: Any Necron formation that can enter the battlefield by Teleportieren oder via a Necron Portal can be held back in reserve. Any Necron formation located in the reserves during the End Phase of the third turn und onwards is considered destroyed für the purpose of tiebreak und the Break Their Spirit tournament scenario objective.

rules.title: Necron Garrisons
description: Only Necron Phalanx und Canoptek Swarm Verbände may garrison in Epic Tournament scenarios. Necron Phalanx Verbände may only garrison from a Tomb Complex objective.

rules.title: The Unbidden
description: Necron armies must contain at least eine 'The Unbidden' formation. Albträume may only contest objectives, must start the game in the reserves, und may not use Necron Portals.

rules.title: Extradimensional Conduit
description: Necron units may re-roll 1:s when testing für Teleportieren Mishap.

rules.title: Regeneration
description: Regeneration functions exactly like an Unmodifizierter Rettungswurf except that it is a 5+ save rather than 6+. Against Titan Killer attacks, WE und H-AV must make eine Unmodifizierter Rettungswurf against jeweils point of damage.

rules.title: Living Metal
description: Living Metal functions exactly like an Unmodifizierter Rettungswurf except that it is a 4+ save rather than 6+. Against Titan Killer attacks, WE und H-AV must make eine Unmodifizierter Rettungswurf against jeweils point of damage.

rules.title: Harvester
description: Once pro action by any formation, if a formation mit einemunit with the Harvester Sonderregel takes damage, it may reroll eine failed Regeneration save. During Enganges, eine reroll may be made pro round.

rules.title: Necron Portals
description: Necron Portals can only be used by INF und by any AV oder LV unit that has Geländegängig. Jeweils portal can be used only once pro turn für either entering oder exiting the battlefield, but not both.

A formation that is in the reserves may enter play via a unit with Portal as part of any action that allows movement. Measure their movement using the centre of the objective (in case of a Tomb Complex) oder edge of the unit. Verbände may also leave the board und re-enter the reserves by moving into a Portal. Additionally a formation can leave the board by having a portal pick them up, in a similar way an air transport can pick up friendly units. When a unit with Portal ends an action within 5cm of all units in a friendly formation the Necron player can chose to activate the portal to move that formation back to the reserves. Broken units with Portal can not be used to pick up Verbände in this way.

When a formation enters the reserves the formation can re-enter play immediately via another Portal oder stay in the reserves. Entering oder exiting a Portal requires a full move, meaning that a formation using a double action can exit the battlefield in the first move und use it's second move to enter play again using another Portal, but a formation can not use an advance oder engage action to enter eine und exit another Portal as part of the same move. Any units that are out of coherency at the end of any move is destroyed. A formation picked up by a Portal must remain in the reserves until they can activate to re-enter play. A formation can activate to enter play on the same turn it was picked up, given that the formation had not already activated before it was picked up.

Jeweils time a formation uses a Portal on a unit that is broken, it receives eine Beschussmarke. This also goes für broken Verbände using a broken portal, meaning that eine unit will be lost unless all units are Furchtlos.

If a Portal is in an enemy zone of control, any formation that enters through it must Engage the blocking formation. In addition, if it is also directly under an enemy unit, the portal can still be used to enter the battlefield but the formation that enters must maximize base contact as much as possible with the blocking units.

rules.title: Implacable Advance
description: Necron Verbände receive a +1 bonus when attempting to perform a Marshal action, but suffer a -1 penalty when attempting to perform a March action.

rules.title: Ponderous
description: Units with the Ponderous Sonderregel may only make a single withdrawal move instead of zwei when becoming broken oder failing to rally.

rules.title: Phase Out
description: At the end of any action by any formation, if a broken Necron formation has lost half oder more of its starting number of units, it Phases Out. This means that it is removed from the battlefield, und counts as destroyed für victory condition purposes.

rules.title: Enduring
description: Necron Verbände containing units with Enduring don’t Phase Out. If the formation has lost all units with Enduring it Phase Out as normal.

rules.title: Big Mek
description: Every Gargant Big Mob army must include a Supreme Command character called a Big Mek, which is free. The Big Mek will join most expensive war engine in the army.

rules.title: Mega Transportpanzas und Mega Wummenpanzas
description: Mega Transportpanzas und Mega Wummenpanzas may only transport units from their own formation (i.e., the rules für Kriegsmaschine transports do not apply to them when using the tournament army lists).

rules.title: Power Fields
description: Some Ork war engines are protected by banks of power fields. The number jeweils war engine has is noted on its datasheet. Power fields work in exactly the same manner as Deflektorschilde (see Deflektorschilde), with the sole exception that they may not be repaired once they have been knocked down by a hit, und will instead remain down für the remainder of the battle. In the case of a variable amount of power fields, roll für them straight after the formation is deployed on the table oder offboard.

rules.title: Super-Entbehrlich
description: A formation does not receive a Beschussmarke when a unit with Super-Entbehrlich is destroyed, this includes the extra Beschussmarke from the first casualty of a crossfire und für units destroyed für being out of formation after a move. If a Super-Entbehrlich unit is hit by a weapon with Disrupt it does not inflict a Beschussmarke.
Super-Entbehrlich units killed in an assault do not count when working out the result.
Verbände comprised completely of Entbehrlich und/oder Super-Entbehrlich units do not benefit from any of the rules above.

rules.title: Snakebite Clan Warlords
description: Every Snakebite Clan army must include a Supreme Command character called a Warlord. The Warlord character is free, you don’t have to pay any Punkte für it. The Warlord must be attached to a unit of Brutes in the scrappiest formation in the army (i.e. the formation with the most units that also contains a unit of Brutes. Kriegsmaschinen counts as eine unit pro DC).

rules.title: Push 'Em Harder Ladz
description: Whenever any type of Gargant passes an Action Test that allows movement, the player may opt to change the unit's speed rating to 20cm für the entire duration of the chosen Action, however if this ability is used the model will receive a Critical Hit für with jeweils move that is carried out.

rules.title: Köppe zählen
description: Orks believe that as long as there’s a bunch of them still fighting together (slightly more than they can count bis zu is ideal!) then there’s always a chance that they’ll prevail, no matter the odds. To represent this, Ork Verbände with more than fünf units (i.e., too many to count on the fingers of eine hand), not including Grotz oder Big Gunz units, receive a +1 modifier to any rally rolls they make, und Verbände with more than 10 such units receive a +2 modifier. Für the purposes of this rule Kriegsmaschinen count jeweils point of starting damage capacity as a unit. Kriegsmaschinen with the 'Gottgleiche Maschine' Sonderregel always counts as being more than 10 units.

rules.title: Jetz' geht's los
description: Units with the Jetz' geht's los special rule gain einen zusätzlichen 5cm Speed when their formation performs an Engage Action.

rules.title: Rush ‘em Ladz
description: Verbände that contain eine oder more units with the Rush ‘em Ladz Sonderregel receive a +1 modifier to their Action Test roll when attempting to carry out a March action.

rules.title: Macht des Waagh
description: Orks are not noted für their organisational abilities, und thus usually have a pretty low Initiative. However, if there is eine thing that will galvanise an Ork warband, it’s the thought of a good punch-up! Because of this, Ork Verbände that are attempting to take engage oder double actions receive a +2 modifier to their Action Test roll. Ork Flyboyz similarly relish the chance to shoot things up, und receive a +2 modifier to their Action Test roll when attempting to carry out Interception oder Ground Attack actions (see Aircraft).

rules.title: Clan Goffs Warlord
description: Every Warhorde army must include a Oberbefehlshaber character called a Warlord. The Warlord character is free, you don’t have to pay any Punkte für it. If the army includes any Great Gargants, then the Warlord must be placed in eine of them. Otherwise the Warlord will join a Gargant oder Bosse unit.

rules.title: Heizakult Warlord
description: Every Speed Freaks army must include a Oberbefehlshaber called a Mekboy Bad Ork Biker. The Mekboy Bad Ork Biker unit is free; you don’t have to pay any Punkte für it. The Mekboy Bad Ork Biker unit may be added to any Ork formation in the army.

rules.title: Heizakult
description: Every unit in a Evil Sunz Heizakult army must either have a speed of 30cm plus, oder be transported in a unit mit einemspeed of 30cm plus. In other words, Verbände may not include units mit einemspeed of less than 30cm unless they also have a transport vehicle capable of carrying the unit around.

rules.title: Coordinated Fire
description: A formation that contains at least eine unit with Coordinated Fire can order bis zu zwei other un-broken Verbände within 15cm that have not taken an action this turn to follow their own formation when they take an Advance, Double oder Sustained Fire action.

Make a single Initiative roll für all foarmations, counting a single -1 modifier if any have Beschussmarke. If the test is failed then the original formation (containing the unit calling für Coordinated Fire) receives a Beschussmarke und must take a hold action. The other Verbände are unaffected (und may take an action later in the turn). If the test is passed then all Verbände concerned are allowed to take either an Advance, Double oder Sustained Fire action.

There is no obligation für all Verbände to take the same action, und these actions may be resolved in any order, but they must all fire at the same target formation. If the formation being activated is unable oder unwilling to fire at the selected formation, it cannot fire at all that turn. The Verbände don’t have to stay within a given distance of jeweils other und will complete their actions eine after the other. Jeweils Verbände action is declared und resolved (including testing to see if the target formation breaks) before moving on to the next Tau formation.

rules.title: Energiefeld
description: Tau Energiefelder work like an Unmodifizierter Rettungswurf in all respects, except it is 5+ instead of 6+. Against Titan Killer attacks, WE und H-AV must make eine Unmodifizierter Rettungswurf against jeweils point of damage.

rules.title: Guided Raketen
description: Guided Raketen may be fired without Line of Sight, but may only be fired at a targets that are Marked with Markerlights.

Guided Raketen follow all the normal suppression rules. If a unit mit einemGuided Rakete weapon is within range und Line of Sight to a unit in the target formation then it is counted für suppression purposes, even if the target formation is not Marked.
Guided Raketen counts as having Line of Sight to all units in a Marked formation für the purpose of suppression, Crossfire und when shooting as part of an Overwatch action.

rules.title: Markerlights
description: All enemy Verbände with at least eine unit within 30cm range und Line of Sight of at least eine Tau unit with the Markerlights Sonderregel is considered to be Marked. When shooting at a Marked formation, all ranged Feuerkraft attacks gain einen zusätzlichen +1 modifier to their To-Hit roll. This bonus für shooting at a Marked enemy may not be used when making Anti-Aircraft attacks, oder with BP type attacks. A Tau formation that is broken oder has Marched this turn may not mark enemy Verbände.

rules.title: Tau Jet Packs
description: Tau Jet Packs follow all the rules für Sprungmodule. In addition, Verbände that exclusively consists of units with Tau Jet Packs are allowed to make an extra move of bis zu 10cm at the end of an Advance, Double oder March action. The extra move is allowed whether oder not the unit fires und takes place after any firing. This extra move may be in any direction und follows all the normal movement rules, so unit coherency und zones of control must be adhered to as usual.

rules.title: Tiger Shark Gun Drones
description: Transported Gun Drone Verbände may be split across multiple Tiger Sharks as an exception to the normal aircraft transport rules. The Tiger Sharks cannot land, Engage, oder embark units, but can disembark transported Gun Drones after an approach move. The Gun Drone formation may shoot when it disembarks as normal (see Transporting Ground Units), und counts as having activated für that turn. After this initial deployment the Gun Drones are a completely independent formation.

rules.title: Synapse
description: The following rules applies to Primary und Secondary Synapse Swarm Verbände only. Synapse creatures are any unit with the 'Synapse' Sonderregel. A Synapse Swarm with no remaining Synapse creatures has an Initiative Rating of 3+ und may neither capture nor contest objectives, including They Shall Not Pass.

A Synapse Swarm with remaining Synapse creatures can absorb other Synapse Swarm Verbände with no remaining Synapse creatures at the end of its action. The formation must have eine unit within 5cm of a unit from the formation(s) being absorbed. The units und Beschussmarke of an absorbed formation become part of the formation (broken Verbände are considered to have an equal number of Beschussmarke as the number of remaining units/starting DC). An absorbed formation is considered completely destroyed für the purposes of tie-break und the Break Their Spirit objective.

rules.title: Hive Mind Locus
description: As long as the Tyranid army contains a unit with Hive Mind Locus it may re-roll a single failed Initiative test (of any type) once pro turn (unless all units with Hive Mind Locus are located offboard).

rules.title: Broodmind
description: All Genestealer Cult Verbände containing an Iconward, Magus, Primus, Patriarch, oder Broodlord receive a +1 modifier to their Action Test when carrying out an Engage action, und gain a +1 modifier when attempting to Rally.

rules.title: Genestealer Cult Characters
description: Genestealer Cult characters may only be added to units of INF that were not added to the formation as part of an upgrade.

rules.title: Hive Mind
description: All Tyranid Verbände receive a +1 modifier to their Action Test when carrying out an Engage action, und a +1 modifier to their Rally Tests.

rules.title: Shoot the Big Ones!
description: The enemies of the Tyranids have learned that destroying the Hive Mind's Synapse Creatures will cause Tyranid swarms to become disorganized. Für this reason certain units which normally would be Infanterie are instead Light Vehicles.

rules.title: Extreme Mobility
description: Tyranid AV und WE units do not take dangerous oder terrain tests. Tyranid LV units move through terrain und receive cover as if they were INF, und Tyranid INF does not need to take difficult terrain tests. Fortified positions such as Minefields, Razor Wire, und special terrain features affect Tyranids normally.

rules.title: Extreme Mobility (Genestealer Cult)
description: Acolyte Hybrids, Aberrants, Genestealers, und Metamorph Hybrids does not need to take terrain tests. Fortified positions such as Minefields, Razor Wire, und special terrain features affect these units normally.

rules.title: Gaunts
description: Half (rounding up) of Termagants, Hormagaunts, Gargoyles, und Raveners that are killed in an assault do not count für combat resolution und are Entbehrlich as long as there is at least eine model with Synapse still present in the formation.

rules.title: Dagon Vanguard Organisms
description: Only Genestealers, Lictors, und Nest Swarms may deploy as garrisons.

rules.title: Hydra Vanguard Organisms
description: Only Genestealers, Lictors, und Dimachaeron may deploy as garrisons.

rules.title: Swarm (x)
description: In the End Phase, before Verbände have rallied, all unbroken Tyranid Verbände with both Swarm (x) und Synapse creatures may 'Swarm'.

Für jeweils Swarm point, eine unit with the 'Gaunts' rule that has been lost during the battle may be added to the formation, but jeweils unit with 'Swarm (x)' may only bring back the types of units that are within brackets next to its 'Gaunt Pouch'.

All units returned to play in this manner must be placed within 5cm of a unit from the formation that was there prior to Swarming, und may not be placed in enemy zones of control oder impassable terrain. Not all generated Swarm Punkte need to be used, but may not be saved für future turns.

rules.title: General Tournament Tiebreaker Rules
description: If a player gives up the game, oder does not show up within 30 minutes it is scored as a Total Victory für the opponent. If a game must be abandoned before turn 4 because of lack of time, the current objective total determines the score, mit einem-4 penalty für both sides if the game ended prematurely in turn 2, und a -2 penalty für both sides if the game ended prematurely in turn 3. If eine player was late to the game start by more than 5 minutes, that player takes both player’s penalties.

rules.title: Brood Brothers
description: As long as a formation contains eine Genestealer Patriarch, Genestealer Primus, Genestealer Magus, oder Hybrid Iconward, units in in the same formation with the 'Brood Brothers' Sonderregel do not cause Beschussmarke when they are destroyed, oder when hit by a weapon with the 'Disrupt' Sonderregel. This includes the extra Beschussmarke from the first casualty of a crossfire und für units destroyed für being out of formation after a move. Units with 'Brood Brothers' that are killed in an assault count für the purposes of working out its result.

rules.title: Broodcoven
description: The army must include a Broodcoven formation. The enemy counts as having achieved the ‘Break Their Spirit’ (BTS) victory condition if they destroy this formation oder the most expensive formation in the army.

rules.title: Thousand Sons Characters
description: Thousand Sons characters may only be added to units of Chaos Space Marines, Rubric Marines, Scarab Occult Terminatoren, oder Sorcerer Disc Riders.

rules.title: Overlord Insertion
description: Some Primaris Space Marines are equipped with heavy Sprungmodule oder Gravschirme designed to be dropped from low orbit onto the battlefield from the assault bays of low-orbiting attack crafts. This ability is represented by the formation gaining the Self Planetfall Sonderregel, with eine exception: Roll to scatter only für the first unit in the formation, then place the rest of the units within 5cm of the first unit.
